description: System-wide Akka.NET metrics used for profiling Akka.NET performance. Gathered via Phobos and OpenTelemetry. Built for Phobos 2.x.

panels.description: Total number of active Akka.Cluster Members.
panels.title: Active Cluster Size

panels.description: All nodes in the cluster that are detected to be unreachable.
panels.title: Unreachable Nodes

panels.description: Tracks all nodes by their membership status and reachability.
panels.title: Cluster Nodes by Status

panels.description: Status of all Akka.NET applications in the current job / instance. Current up to the minute.
panels.title: Akka.NET Instances

panels.description: Total aggregate logging activity per-second for each node in an Akka.NET cluster.
panels.title: Cluster Logging Activity

panels.description: Groups all exceptions detected in Akka.NET logs by type.

targets.expr: sum by(job, instance, akka_address, exceptiontype)(ceil(increase(akka_logs_events_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance",exceptiontype=~".+"}[$__rate_interval]))) or vector(0)

panels.title: Exceptions by Type

panels.description: Total errors logged by Akka.NET over the time window.
panels.title: Total Errors Logged

panels.description: Average number of unprocessed messages in actor mailboxes. Higher values indicate system pressure and potential bottlenecks.
panels.title: Actor Mailbox Backlog (System Pressure)

panels.description: The full set of Akka.NET actors running on all nodes for all roles in a cluster.
panels.title: Total Akka.NET Actors

panels.description: Cumulative Akka.NET messaging throughput across all selected nodes and roles.
panels.title: Total Actor Throughput (msg/s)

panels.description: Akka.NET message throughput by message type.
panels.title: Akka.NET Message Totals by Type  (Top 10)

panels.description: Akka.NET message throughput by message type.
panels.title: Akka.NET Message Throughput by Type  (Top 10)

panels.description: Top 10 actor type / exception type pairs, based on the number of crashes per second observed over a 30 minute timespan.
panels.title: Actor Crashes by Actor / Exception (Top 10)

panels.description: Shows the distribution of $shardRegion shards across all nodes in the cluster.
panels.title: Shard Distribution [$shardRegion]

panels.description: Shows the distribution of $shardRegion entities across all nodes in the cluster. Please note that this number reflects the total number of ALIVE entity actors.
panels.title: Entity Distribution [$shardRegion]

list.description: The name of the OTEL workload.
list.label: Job
list.name: job

list.description: Single instance of a particular job.
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

list.description: All of the available shardRegions in the current Akka.NET cluster.
list.label: shardRegion
list.name: shardRegion

list.description: `/user` actors created by end-users, `/system` actors created by internal frameworks, or both.
list.label: actor types
list.name: actor_category

title: Akka.NET Cluster + Phobos Metrics
